Summary: Saw a UFo as we were coming home on the 215 FWY.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Perris
There were no other sightings in Perris on or around March 13th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 8:15 pm and as we were driving south on the 215 Fwy we saw directly in front of us, up in the sky a blue and white light which looked like what a meteor looks like..flying very fast across the skies. Very high rate of speed. We got a quick look at it and suddenly it disappeared. It was beautiful...unfortunately we didn't see it for very long. We, my husband and I were very shocked to see it...had never seen something like that! It was definitely some type of UFO.
